entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
